name: Dawn, Dusk, Revolver
description:
DAWN, DUSK, REVOLVER:
Made for #mysticwestern game jam 2016

You are a cowboy having an existential crisis. Lost in the desert you encounter a strange old man who tells you he can help you...

Go Reach Cowboy Enlightenment In!!!!...
DAWN, DUSK, REVOLVER!

Controls:
"W" is move upwards
"Left-Mouse button" is shoot

Helpful Tips:
The "Ace playing card" is a power-up bullet.
To Defeat the Capricorn Boss: "The Eye Is The Key..."

Credits:
Art & Code: Brian Callahan - @futuristteletex
Additional art: Hunter Trammell - @SodapopHT

"Let the inner god that is in each one of us speak. The temple is your body, and the priest is your heart: it is from here that every awareness must begin."- Alejandro Jodorowsky
